title: Increase in MS - effect on inflation and currency

content.question: Assume that the world operates under a flexible exchange rate system. Mexico has a banking system with limited reserves. If the central bank of Mexico increases its money supply, Mexicoâ€™s inflation rate and the international value of the Mexican peso will most likely change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Inflation Rate International Value of the Peso Increase Appreciate
Inflation Rate International Value of the Peso Increase Depreciate
Inflation Rate International Value of the Peso Increase No change
Inflation Rate International Value of the Peso Decrease Appreciate
Inflation Rate International Value of the Peso Decrease Depreciate

content.answer: Inflation Rate International Value of the Peso Increase Depreciate
